creator: michael_rennie@ca.ibm.com
text:
While updating Ant support in Eclipse to version 1.9.2, the legal team noticed the class Javadoc comment in Zip64ExtendedInformationExtraField copies some of the specification doc from the PKWARE into the class Javadoc. This appears to be in violation of section 1.4.2 of their license, unless of course Ant has permission to do so.

The relevant portion of their license:

"1.4.2 Use of the content of this document within other publications is 
   permitted only through reference to this document.  Any reproduction
   or distribution of this document in whole or in part without prior
   written permission from PKWARE is strictly prohibited."

The recommended solution would be to remove the offending comments from the class Javadoc, leave the link make mention of section 4.5.3.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
I'm pretty sure there are more citations inside the zip package as well.  Maybe we shouldn't have added the link ;-)

Seriously, I'll look into it and remove all direct citations.
